abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, continuously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2x damage to units being tossed.
abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.story: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
abilities.name: Toss
abilities.story: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.

abilities.description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.story: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.

abilities.description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
abilities.name: Tree Throw
abilities.story: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

abilities.description: Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
abilities.name: Tree Volley
abilities.story: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

abilities.description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
abilities.name: Grow
abilities.story: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

description: Grows in size and strength as battle ensues. A curious being of animated stone, Tiny roams the world in search of his origins. Seemingly mild-mannered, the Stone Giant is nonetheless a force to behold as he brings down a multitude of Avalanches. He Tosses friends and foes alike across the battlefield, landing them on top of enemies and into the fray. Growing to tremendous size and strength as the battle progresses, Tiny's power can quickly become terrifying. Some have even claimed to witness the Stone Giant Wielding a Massive Tree, bludgeoning and Volleying Trees at a fortress until only rubble remained.  Carry Nuker Pusher Initiator Durable Disabler
trivia: Tiny's quote " Link▶️ Tiny Smash!" is a reference to Hulk, a well-known superhero from the Marvel Universe.
history: Coming to life as a chunk of stone, Tiny's origins are a mystery on which he continually speculates. He is a Stone Giant now, but what did he used to be? A splinter broken from a Golem's heel? A shard swept from a gargoyle-sculptor's workshop? A fragment of the Oracular Visage of Garthos? A deep curiosity drives him, and he travels the world tirelessly seeking his origins, his parentage, his people. As he roams, he gathers weight and size; the forces that weather lesser rocks, instead cause Tiny to grow and ever grow.

notes: The strength talent effectively grants Tiny 200 health, 1 health regeneration, and 10 main attack damage bonus.
The status resistance talent stacks multiplicatively with other sources of status resistance.
